header.name: Leon Chike Nwankwo
header.personalStatement: Product Leader skilled in creating data-driven platforms and shipping delightful experiences. Adept in strategic road mapping, user-centered design, and aligning product strategy with business objectives to drive growth.

education.title: Bachelor of Science, Finance, Accounting, and Rhetoric

College Park, MD

experience.title: Senior Technical Product Manager
experience.subtitle: Rebuildee, Inc.
bullets: Increased average order value by 23% and exceeded conversion rate targets by 15% through the design and integration of a machine-learning product recommendation engine; leveraging customer data and purchase patterns to provide personalized product recommendations

Engineered an error resolution app that utilized pre-trained AI to analyze production errors, provide clear error descriptions, and offer targeted resolutions; accelerating error resolution and boosting application stability
Architected a robust, enterprise-grade microservices platform using Node.js, Docker, and AWS ECS, supporting 4x customer growth and handling a 17x increase in API usage over 2 years
Designed a centralized KPI dashboard providing real-time visibility into financial, engineering, and operational metrics, driving data-driven decisions and enabling cross-functional alignment
Spearheaded process improvements across design and engineering, resulting in a 30% decrease in time-to-market, strengthening competitive positioning, and enabling rapid, iterative feature releases

experience.title: Manager, Management Consultant
experience.subtitle: Deloitte Consulting / Deloitte Digital, LLC
bullets: Led a cross-functional team to develop a machine learning application for JP Morgan Chase, organizing 200M+ pension files into a database resilient to regulatory audits. Streamlined the data pipeline, saving $12.9M and 95,000 hours of manual processing annually, while improving projected free cash flow

Improved corporate expense reporting user experience through user research, A/B testing, and prototyping, resulting in a 16% increase in engagement, better real-time operational visibility, and 37% more accurate expense tracking

Managed multiple concurrent engagements, effectively communicating project status, risks, and strategic recommendations to executive-level stakeholders at client organizations and internal business leaders. Navigated complex organizational dynamics to drive alignment and achieve project objectives

Scaled a product-focused practice from 11 to 40+ members through proactive recruiting, mentorship, and promoting a culture of innovation; while fostering cross-functional collaboration between design and engineering teams

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.subtitle: Capital One Innovation Labs, LLC
bullets: Led the development of a data-driven risk algorithm to address unmet needs for personalized financial advising, enabling 500+ advisors to deliver tailored investment strategies

Managed the integration of a risk algorithm and client life updates into the advisor dashboard, syncing data with legacy systems; increasing advisor-client interactions by 35%, and raising client satisfaction to an NPS of 76
